abstract: United Nations World Food Program warns residents of Taiz, Yemen, are on brink of famine as  combatants continue blocking delivery of emergency supplies by aid groups.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Embattled City at Risk of Famine, United Nations Warns
headline.main: Yemen: Embattled City at Risk of Famine, United Nations Warns

snippet: Combatants have prevented aid groups from delivering emergency supplies, the United Nations said on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Combatants have prevented aid groups from delivering emergency supplies, the United Nations said on Monday.
